longbridge.services

Interface AdminUserService


  • public interface AdminUserService
    The AdminUserService interface provides the methods for managing an Admin user

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(AdminUser user)
      Creates an Admin user
      void changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword, java.lang.String hashedNewPassword)
      Replaces the old password of the admin user with the new password.
      void generateAndSendPassword(AdminUser user)
      Generates and sends password to an admin user
      AdminUser getUser(java.lang.Long userId)
      Returns an AdminUser having the specified userId
      java.lang.Iterable<AdminUser> getUsers()
      Returns all admin users existing in the system
      void resetPassword(AdminUser user)
      Resets the password of the specified Admin user
      void setPassword(AdminUser user, java.lang.String hashedPassword)
      Sets the password for the specified admin user.

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        AdminUser getUser(java.lang.Long userId)
        Returns an AdminUser having the specified userId
        Parameters:
        userId - the user's Id
        Returns:
        the admin user

      • getUsers

        java.lang.Iterable<AdminUser> getUsers()
        Returns all admin users existing in the system
        Returns:
        a list of the admin users

      • setPassword

        void setPassword(AdminUser user,
                 java.lang.String hashedPassword)
        Sets the password for the specified admin user. Also, the password must meet the organization's password policy if any one has been defined It is important that the password is hashed before storing it in the database.
        Parameters:
        user - the admin user
        hashedPassword - the hashed password

      • addUser

        void addUser(AdminUser user)
        Creates an Admin user
        Parameters:
        user - the new admin user

      • resetPassword

        void resetPassword(AdminUser user)
        Resets the password of the specified Admin user
        Parameters:
        user - the admin user

      • changePassword

        void changePassword(java.lang.String oldPassword,
                    java.lang.String hashedNewPassword)
        Replaces the old password of the admin user with the new password. The new password must meet the organisation's password policy if any one has been defined It is important that the password is hashed before storing it in the database.
        Parameters:
        oldPassword - the old password
        hashedNewPassword - the new password

      • generateAndSendPassword

        void generateAndSendPassword(AdminUser user)
        Generates and sends password to an admin user
